statements: UPDATE data_aggregation SET sales_amount = 1500.50, region = 'North' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE data_aggregation SET product_category = 'Electronics', region = 'South', date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE data_aggregation SET sales_amount = 1500.50, region = 'East' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE data_aggregation SET product_category = 'Electronics', sales_amount = 2000.75 WHERE region = 'West';
UPDATE dataset_table SET dataset_name = 'New Dataset Name', created_date = NOW() WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE aggregation_table SET summary_result = 100.5, aggregation_method = 'Average' WHERE dataset_id = 2;
UPDATE dataset_table SET dataset_name='New Dataset 1', dataset_size=100000 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE aggregation_table SET summary_result=50.5, aggregation_method='Average' WHERE aggregation_id=3;
UPDATE dataset SET name = 'John', value = 100.50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE dataset SET value = 75.20, date = '2022-09-15' WHERE name = 'Alice';
UPDATE dataset SET name='John Doe', value=100.50 WHERE id=1
UPDATE dataset SET date='2021-05-20', value=75.25, name='Jane Smith' WHERE id=2
